author: angela
msg: - improved exception message converting Path-part of ItemIds to jcr-path
- getValues: avoid replacing ItemNotFoundException by RepositoryException

author: tabish
msg: Refactor to use auto_ptr to help reduce the possibility of leaking resources when calling createConnection and an exception occurs during the process of creating the objects that make up the connection.

author: tabish
msg: Add an additional test to check for leaks when a ConnectionFactory fails to create a valid connection object.

author: tabish
msg: Refactor to use an AtomicInteger instead of a mutex to get command IDs
